title: Developer DAO
description: A community of builders who believe in collective ownership of the internet.
callout: We're forming guilds, creating culture, strengthening our community, teaching & learning, and building cool things together.

mission.title: Mission
mission.body: Developer DAO exists to accelerate the education and impact of a new wave of web3 builders.

transparency.title: Transparency
transparency.body: open source everything, conversations in public, document and share journey

diversity.title: Diversity and Inclusion
diversity.body: seek to foster as diverse a membership as possible and support everyone to contribute

responsibility.title: Responsibility
responsibility.body: as a self-governed community we rely on members to be personally responsible for their actions and commitments to the community

kindness.title: Kindness and Empathy
kindness.body: we know that we are living in a complex, stressful, and diverse world and go out of our way to make peopleâ€™s lives and days better through our interactions

goals.title: Goals
goals.body2: Foster & Build Web3 Tools & Public Goods

wiki.title: DAO WIKI
wiki.body: Take a look at what's going on

membership.title: How do I join?
membership.body: To gain access to Developer DAO you can acquire one of our genesis NFTs on the open market or from another DAO member.

socialLinkLabel: Opens the Developer DAO {{platform}} in the current tab
